I’ll be going

as a naturalist

on a British navy

survey ship.

That’s even more questionable!

And they plan to take you along, with no credentials

as a naturalist whatsoever?

Sounds very suspicious to me.

Oh boy…

I’m sure my judgment is sound. However...

If there was even one person whom I considered an authority to advise you to get on that ship, then I would agree to your plan.

There’s

surely

nobody that

Father knows

who would

agree to this.

51
